title: Shea Moisture - Raw Shea Butter Baby Healing Lotion, 13 oz lotion
description: Calm and comfort baby's delicate skin with this nutrient-rich moisturizing lotion. Our special blend of organic Shea Butter and healing Chamomile helps soothe irritated skin. Argan Oil, Frankincense and Myrrh Extract keep skin soft and smooth Shea Butter-Deeply moisturizes and repairs skin with vitamins and essential fatty acidsChamomile - Anti-inflammatory properties help soothe red, irritated skinArgan Oil - High in Vitamin E, keeps skin soft and smooth.
